description: This file provides utility functions for date and time formatting, including relative time descriptions, short date, time, and full date-time strings, primarily leveraging the intl package for locale-aware formatting.

classes.name: DateFormatUtils
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods for human-friendly date/time formatting, including relative timestamps, short dates, times, and full date-time strings.

methods.name: sanityString
methods.description: Returns a fixed date string ('Jan 1, 2000') for testing or placeholder purposes.

methods.name: showRelative
methods.description: Returns a human-readable relative time difference, such as 'Just now', '5 min ago', or 'Yesterday'.

methods.name: showShortDate
methods.description: Returns a short, locale-aware date string (e.g., 'Mar 5, 2025').

methods.name: showTime
methods.description: Returns just the time portion of a DateTime object formatted (e.g., '3:45 PM').

methods.name: showFullDateTime
methods.description: Returns a combined date and time string (e.g., 'Mar 5, 2025 3:45 PM').
